name: opencode-orchestrator
description: Distributed Cognitive Architecture for OpenCode. Turns simple prompts into specialized multi-agent workflows (Planner, Coder, Reviewer).
author: agnusdei1207

scripts.build: shx rm -rf dist && npx esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --outfile=dist/index.js --platform=node --format=esm && tsc --emitDeclarationOnly && shx mkdir -p dist/scripts && npx esbuild scripts/postinstall.ts --bundle --outfile=dist/scripts/postinstall.js --platform=node --format=esm && npx esbuild scripts/preuninstall.ts --bundle --outfile=dist/scripts/preuninstall.js --platform=node --format=esm
scripts.test:all: vitest run --reporter=verbose && echo '=== ALL TESTS PASSED ==='
scripts.release:patch: npm run build && npm version patch && git push --follow-tags && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:minor: npm run build && npm version minor && git push --follow-tags && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:major: npm run build && npm version major && git push --follow-tags && npm publish --access public
scripts.dev:clean: shx rm -rf $(npm root -g)/opencode-orchestrator /opt/homebrew/lib/node_modules/opencode-orchestrator 2>/dev/null; npm cache clean --force && echo 'Cleaned: NVM + Homebrew + cache'
scripts.dev:link: npm run build && npm link && /opt/homebrew/bin/npm link 2>/dev/null; echo 'SUCCESS: Linked to NVM + Homebrew. Restart OpenCode.'
scripts.dev:unlink: npm unlink -g opencode-orchestrator 2>/dev/null; /opt/homebrew/bin/npm unlink -g opencode-orchestrator 2>/dev/null; npm run dev:clean && echo 'SUCCESS: Unlinked from all'
scripts.dev:status: echo '=== NVM ===' && ls -la $(npm root -g)/opencode-orchestrator 2>/dev/null || echo 'Not linked'; echo '=== Homebrew ===' && ls -la /opt/homebrew/lib/node_modules/opencode-orchestrator 2>/dev/null || echo 'Not linked'
scripts.reset:local: brew uninstall opencode 2>/dev/null; rm -rf ~/.config/opencode ~/.opencode ~/.local/share/opencode ~/.cache/opencode/node_modules/opencode-orchestrator && echo '=== Clean done ===' && brew install opencode && echo '{"plugin": ["opencode-orchestrator"], "$schema": "https://opencode.ai/config.json"}' > ~/.config/opencode/opencode.json && echo '=== Reset (Dev) complete. Run: opencode ==='
scripts.reset:prod: brew uninstall opencode 2>/dev/null; rm -rf ~/.config/opencode ~/.opencode ~/.local/share/opencode ~/.cache/opencode/node_modules/opencode-orchestrator && echo '=== Clean done ===' && brew install opencode && echo '{"plugin": ["opencode-orchestrator"], "$schema": "https://opencode.ai/config.json"}' > ~/.config/opencode/opencode.json && npm install -g opencode-orchestrator && echo '=== Reset (Prod) complete. Run: opencode ==='
